io.micronaut.jackson.modules

Class BeanIntrospectionModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.Module
      • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.module.SimpleModule
        • io.micronaut.jackson.modules.BeanIntrospectionModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.fasterxml.jackson.core.Versioned, Serializable

    @Internal
 @Singleton
 @Requires(property="jackson.bean-introspection-module",
          notEquals="false")
public class BeanIntrospectionModule
extends com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.module.SimpleModule
    A Jackson module that adds reflection-free bean serialization and deserialization for Micronaut.
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    graemerocher
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
